sub_title: Senior Vice President EMEA, New Balance
summary:
Nearly 20 years as a visionary, strategic, and customer focussed leader with the ability to manage across multiple functions. International General Manager with extensive experience in branded categories, Food, Sporting goods and Apparel, Lingerie, Fashion. Extensive and successful retail experience.

Consumer Brand Building, Sales Management, Operations and General Management in Fast Moving Consumables, Sporting Goods, Footwear, Apparel and Lingerie

Spezialgebiete
Organizational Skill Development, Strategic Plan Creation, Supply and Logistics Development and Business Planning, Consumer Brand Building, International Sales Management
